name: [V2.0]Artist: 赤倉 | Akakura artist's painting style
description:
赤倉 Style LORA V2

仿赤倉的作画风格的LORA模型。

权重建议值：0.8 (or 0.5~1)

基于模型：CreationMixV1 Trimmed

训练信息：共计202张原画，迭代1212步。

The LORA model mimics Akakura's painting style.

Recommended weight value: 0.8 (or 0.5~1)

Based on model: CreationMixV1 Trimmed

Training information:

A total of 202 original paintings with 1212 iterations.

使用全新的训练模式以提升模型质量。

Use new training modes to improve model quality.
